lead_paragraph: The aircraft was hit by ground fire as it returned from a mission to Aleppo, according to a statement from the Russian Defense Ministry.

byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon, and Maher Samaan from Paris.

headline.print_headline: Russian Copter Downed in Syria; 5 Die
headline.main: Russian Military Helicopter Is Shot Down in Syria, Killing 5

snippet: The aircraft was hit by ground fire as it returned from a mission to Aleppo, according to a statement from the Russian Defense Ministry....
abstract: Russian military transport helicopter is shot down in Idlib, Syria, killing all five people on board; episode is deadliest for Russian military since it intervened in country.
